it.polimi.se.eliafinazzigrazioli.adrenaline.server

Interface ServerRemoteRMI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerRMIManager

    public interface ServerRemoteRMI
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Server remote object. It exposes a method to receive incoming events, a method for ID requests, one for clients sign on and one for sign off.

    • Method Summary

      int askNewClientId()
      Offers a new client id.
      void receive(AbstractViewEvent event)
      Receive method is called by remote clients which send view-generated events as a parameter.

      Remove client rmi.

        void receive(AbstractViewEvent event)
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Parameters:

        java.rmi.RemoteException - the remote exception
